mapper.select: select public_type hotGoodsShowNum from t_sys_dictionary where dict_name = 'hot_goods_show_num'
select image_url as slideshowPath, goods_id as goodsId from t_sys_slide where slide_status = 1 and is_delete = 0 and now() between start_time and end_time

select t1.goods_id as goodsId, t2.goods_name as goodsName, t2.goods_image as goodsImagePath, t2.selling_price as goodsPrice from t_hot_goods t1, t_goods_info t2 where t1.goods_id = t2.id order by t1.sort asc limit #{showNumber}
